original_text: And when the servants of Hadadezer saw that they had been defeated by Israel, they made peace with David and became subject to him. So the Syrians were not willing to save the Ammonites anymore.
korean_text: 하닷에셀의 부하들이 자기가 이스라엘 앞에서 패하였음을 보고 다윗과 더불어 화친하여 섬기고 그 후로는 아람 사람이 암몬 자손 돕기를 원하지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: And when the servants of Hadadezer saw
that they had been defeated by Israel,
So the Syrians were not willing

sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 암몬 사람들을 구원하는 것을
